name: City center
uniques: Unpillagable
Irremovable
Unbuildable

civilopediaText.text: Marks the center of a city
Appearance changes with the technological era of the owning civilization

name: Farm
uniques: Can also be built on tiles adjacent to fresh water
[+1 Food] for each adjacent [Farm] <after discovering [Crop Variety]>
[+1 Food] for each adjacent [Pasture] <after discovering [Fertiliser]>
[+2 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Crop Variety]>
[+2 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Crop Variety]>
[+2 Food] from [non-fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Fertiliser]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]
